about_the_game:
Online Adult Content Manager - Online Content Manager converts OACM to OCM! This DLC converts OACM to the safe to use OCM for everyone.

*This DLC is a visual alteration and does not change the way OACM functions*
detailed_description:
Online Adult Content Manager - Online Content Manager converts OACM to OCM! This DLC converts OACM to the safe to use OCM for everyone.

*This DLC is a visual alteration and does not change the way OACM functions*

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
